solution_line_template: First find the number of cups of potatoes Carrie adds per one cup of turnips: {potatoes_initial} cups potatoes / {turnips_initial} cups turnips = <<{potatoes_initial}/{turnips_initial}={potato_to_turnip_ratio}>>{potato_to_turnip_ratio} cups potatoes/cup turnips

Then divide the number of cups of potatoes she has that that ratio to find the number of cups of turnips she adds: {potatoes_current} cups potatoes / {potato_to_turnip_ratio} cups potatoes/cup turnips = <<{potatoes_current}/{potato_to_turnip_ratio}={turnips_to_add}>>{turnips_to_add} cups turnips
